Ok, the suspense was killing you. You and your brother make your way into the living room where Riley was antsily pacing back and forth. When you both walked in he started jumping in excitement. Under normal circumstances, you would inwardly condemn his childish behavior but they have you both so curious you didn’t really even remember how much you despised it. In fact, it just increased the anxiety you were already feeling.

“Oh my god, oh my god!! PLEASE show him already!” Riley said. “Tyler has the most awesomest thing EVER.” Riley explained.

Tyler pulled a device out of his pants pocket. It was a weird little thing, in a gun shape, with what looked like a display menu on the side.
It kind of looked like a toy alien ray gun you might see a child play with. The one with the rings around the ‘stem’.

You couldn’t help but snort out loud. Was this what they brought you down here for? Some toy gun with an LED display.
Tyler sensed your doubts and you could see him visually grimace.

“Just watch.” He said. He aimed the gun toward a lamp, and pulled the trigger.

Bright lights shot out of the gun and immediately you started paying closer attention.
The lights shot back into the gun. That’s when Tyler aimed it on the floor near him and shot again; and an exact replica of the lamp appeared.
You stood there, mouth agape staring at it. Is this real?! You asked yourself.

“Go ahead and touch it. It’s real I promise.” Tyler said.

Riley laughed at you while you touched the lamp in awe, him obviously already seeing this before.

“How, what?!” Was all you managed to get out.

“It’s a cloning gun!!” Riley yelled.

“I got it from this old sciencey dude; he’s my...eerr was my friends neighbor.” Tyler said.

That explaination did not satisfy you. “Where is he now?” You asked, wondering what happened.

“Oh.” Tyler said, almost not expecting that question. “He’s around.”

Riley started giggling.

You rolled your eyes. It’s like he wasn’t explaining everything. And does he even know what this decide could do?
End world hunger, for instance, if more were made. You weren’t sure it should be in the hands of some teenagers.

“So...he just gave it to you?”

“Well, kind of. I guess it was made to clone dogs...he thought if you could clone your dogs back to life after they died you would have a permanent pet.”

Wait, what? Did he just basically say this device can make your pet immortal?

“See, the screen here is for selecting what clone number you want to use. Kind of like a save point in a video game. They come back with whatever memories that clone number had. Tyler explained. “First you gotta shoot them with the gun, that saves the clone. Then you can “create” them at any time. This other switch is for vaporizing...easier to get rid of the corpse. Cool huh?”

“...immortality.” You said.

Everything in your mind just stopped. You didn’t know how to feel about this.
It’s like you had a little angel and devil arguing on your shoulders; one wants to exploit this and live forever, maybe be insanely rich too; and the other one wants to turn it into the government or maybe save the world.

“I don’t know...what to say...” you said, lost in thought.

Riley jumped for joy. “I have one too, see?” Riley said, pulling out his gun.

Your thoughts broke and you looked over at Riley. No. This was definitely bad. Tyler was a bit more mature than Riley, and could be reasoned with, but Riley having his own gun? This could be an issue.

“We cloned the gun.” Tyler said.

You looked at Riley who was STILL acting antsy, and behind that layer of excitement there was a bit of impatience present.

“Look guys i don’t think we should have these...” you said.

“Geez. Party pooper!” Riley said, not to your surprise.

“Yeah. Don’t be such a killjoy.” Tyler agreed. Shit. He agrees with Riley. “This is EXACTLY why we didn’t make YOU one. Or tell you about any of the OTHER fun stuff...”

“Other stuff?” You asked.

“Yeah. The device has other powers...” Tyler explained.

“We can shrink or...or transform....or or mind control things!!” Riley said excitedly.

“What the hell? No. You guys shouldn’t be able to. We need to notify the authorities...”

“Nah.” Tyler said.

He aimed his gun over to the right and fired a beam, startling you.

Out of the glowing light grew a fully clothed person, in pajamas.
...it was you.

“Whaaa?” The clone said in your voice, waking from sleep.
“What the fuck?!?” He shouted pointing at you and panicking. The clone didn’t know where he was.
You stared at him, heart racing. It was apparent to you that Tyler had to come into your room in the middle of night while you were sleeping and shoot you with the gun, in order for this to happen. You had only one question on your mind.

“Why did you clone me?” You asked him.

That’s when a villainous grin formed on his face.

“He’s yours Riley. I get the original.” Tyler said.

“Cool!!!!” Riley shouted, more than thrilled.

Your vision started to come to, and you saw the room spinning around in circles. You looked up to see a giant Tyler looking down at you with a huge smile on his face. You stare up at him aghast. You look over to see your clone at much the same size, (about 6 inches).

"What happened?! Why are you doing this to me!?" He asked.

He was pleading for his life, and the only difference between him and you was that he was looking up at a giant Riley, and he didn't know what was going on or how it happened.

Riley grinned from ear to ear, looking down at what is still technically his brother, just an earlier version of him. Without saying a word, Riley lifted up his foot; his giant pumped up adidas shoe blackening out the light of the room for the tiny clone as a shadow enveloped him. Immediately and without hesitation Riley slammed it down on your clone, who barely had enough time to brace himself for the impact.
You cried and shuddered when you heard loud snapping noises, and a gargled cry for mercy. Riley ignored the pleas and lifted his shoe up once again. He looked down at his mutilated brother, broken bones and red splattered everywhere, barely alive from the impact and full weight of his foot. You and Tyler watched as Riley brought his leg back; ready to kick the bloodied version of you like a soccer ball. You screamed in terror and watched the redheaded devil slam the tip of his foot into your body, and it flew across the room smacking into the wall with a loud bang. Riley mercilessly walked over to clone, who couldn't move because all his bones were broken. Riley aimed down and zapped the sobbing, broken clone with the gun. You watched the rays returned to the gun. Riley then stuck out his tippy toes and started crushing the clone with his shoe, like you might do to a bug. He grinded the shoe back and forth, squeezing the life out of the clone. He lifted his shoe up and saw all that was left was a mangled mess of a corpse. Riley aimed the gun down, over to the right and shot it again; forming the exact same clone but with a fully repaired body.

The clone screamed and cried for mercy from your brother, begging him to 'please not hurt him."

"Killing little bugs like you is a lot of fun though. I'm not sure I got my fill the first time." Riley told the clone.

He lifted his shoe up again, and the clone saw his own dead body limply dangling from it. Parts of him were everywhere on the treads of Riley's sole. He begged Riley to let him live 'this time.' He said he would do anything the brat wanted. ANYTHING.

'Just don't hurt me again.' he cried.

You watched Riley's smug fucking face look down at him like some kind of object, flashing a toothy grin that made you want to either kill him, or yourself. Not that killing yourself would do any good anymore. It became VERY apparent, the power your brothers held over you now.

"Now THAT'S the kind of service I expect from now on." Riley said out loud looking down at his little, broken version of you. "You can start by cleaning up this mess off my shoe." Riley said.
"Then we'll move on to better things. Hahahaha!" Riley lifted his shoe up, giving his tiny brother a chance to lick his own blood off of it.

You felt yourself get violently dizzy from the scene. Did he kill you just so he could get a better, more subservient version of you? You fell flat on your back and your heart pounded when you noticed Tyler was looking down at you. You couldn't help but pray to God this was a dream. There's no way this could be real.

But you knew it was real when you felt Tyler's fleshy fingers coil around your body, and lift you up to his face.

info.description:
Description

In this story you take on the role of John; just an average teenager trying to live an average life in a modern American middle class home.
Your parents separated several years ago, and your mother gave up custody, so you and your brothers are being raised by your workaholic father. That brings you to your bothers. Ugh.
You don’t hate your brothers, but you don’t particularly like or get along with them, either. You know your dad does his best to make you all feel loved, but you can't help but feel he loves your brothers a little more… Even your mother sends more gifts to them on the holidays than she does to you. You’ve always just assumed it’s because they’re younger, and have since given up the fight for attention from your parents years ago...but you can’t help but feel a little envious of the both of them.

Tyler, your younger brother is far more popular than you ever were at his age. It always seems like he has it better than you do, and you can't help but feel jealous of his popularity and also...of his body. He isn’t toned or ripped or anything...he’s just perfectly skinny. It's ironic, but you've seen him eat nothing but junk food his whole life and yet somehow he still stays skinny. You wished you had it that easy. He usually he spends his time hanging out with his skater buds, and it's easy to see that he's the most popular of them. He usually pretends he’s too cool to hang out with you or even talk to you, and it’s probably because he isn’t pretending. When you have interacted with him, you’ve noticed that he can be pretty cold or almost distant and aloof towards you and the family.

Riley is in the same boat as Tyler. He’s your youngest brother, and easily the most immature of the three of you. He's not as popular as Tyler is, but he's extremely smart and even skipped a grade in middle school despite being diagnosed with severe ADHD. As a matter of fact, he has a high IQ and all of his teachers say that he has a bright future ahead of him. What's funny about Riley, though, is that when he's around his family he acts the most childish of everyone, and he always seems to be the center of attention because of it, too.
